comment:
* Sets things up for issuing error messages.  This class is misnamed, and
 * should be called XalanMessages, or some such.
 * @xsl.usage internal

methods.name: public static final String createMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param msgKey    The key for the message text.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted message string.

methods.name: public static final String createWarning(String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param msgKey    The key for the message text.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted warning string.

methodNames: public static final String createMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
public static final String createWarning(String msgKey, Object[] args)
